summary: Initial discovery call with CTO Marcus Johnson and VP Content Engineering Priya Patel. Discussed content recommendation challenges and AI platform capabilities. Strong interest in POC.
Technical deep-dive with content engineering and data science teams. Reviewed ML architecture, API specifications, and integration approach. Team impressed with latency benchmarks.
Financial review with CFO Sandra Williams and Finance Director Brian Foster. Presented ROI model projecting $15M incremental revenue. Sandra requested 3-year TCO breakdown.
Sent comprehensive data privacy documentation and AI liability framework to General Counsel Elena Rodriguez. Included SOC2 Type II report and data processing addendum draft.
Infrastructure and security review with Michael Chang and Carlos Ruiz. Walked through deployment architecture, multi-region setup, and encryption standards. Both approved the approach.
POC kickoff meeting. Defined success metrics (20%+ engagement lift target), timeline (2 weeks), and technical requirements. Team allocated 3 engineers to the integration.
Product alignment session with VP Product James Chen and PM Aisha Okafor. Reviewed product requirements, UX wireframes for recommendation surfaces. James confirmed Q2 roadmap slot.
Analytics methodology review with Lisa Park. Validated A/B testing framework and engagement metrics methodology for POC measurement. Confirmed statistical significance approach.
Carlos Ruiz confirmed security review completion. All penetration test results and SOC2 compliance items cleared. No outstanding security concerns.

Executive briefing with CFO Sandra Williams and CCO Derek Washington. Presented POC results showing 23% engagement lift. Sandra gave verbal budget approval. Derek impressed with long-tail content discovery.
Content acquisition strategy discussion with Tomoko Nakamura. Explored how AI recommendations can surface underperforming catalog content and strengthen licensing negotiations.
Production rollout planning with Michael Chang and Brian Foster. Discussed deployment timeline, infrastructure costs, and payment terms. Both aligned on Q2 launch target.
Joint technical-legal session with David Kim and Elena Rodriguez. Addressed remaining AI liability questions using POC data. Elena requesting final data processing addendum revision.

Strategic roadmap alignment with CTO Marcus Johnson, VP Product James Chen, and PM Aisha Okafor. Discussed Phase 2 expansion into personalized content creation tools. Strong enthusiasm across the board.

Technical readiness review with Priya Patel, Rachel Torres, and Nina Volkov. Production integration 80% complete. SDK feedback very positive. On track for Q2 launch. Nina submitted initial API client PR.
